name: Soulace v1.0
description:
Soulace - a game of dragging blocks into a grid to defeat enemies. This game was designed around that core mechanic, and the idea is that the grid and block shapes will hopefully place constraints on the player, forcing them to strategize how to use shapes together effectively within these limits.

Game currently in development.

Team:

Programmers: Alex, Anhduy, Daniel Kim, Johnny, Jun, Junior, Tiffany

Artists: Alan, Anya, Chalisa, Cherey, Kate, Natalie, Tiffany

Sound Design: Aloy, Froy

Story: Alan, Anhduy, Anya, Cherey
